thread.section_title: www.arguscarhire.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.arguscarhire.com | www.arguscarhire.com
thread.title: Mornay Mornay

author: Mornay Mornay
title: Mornay Mornay
text:
My first trip was in November 2000, that's when I stumbled upon Arguscarhire. Since then I have used ArgusCarhire for all my business and leisure car hire.
I've compared proices directly with car rental services and still find best value with Arguscarhire. The rental process is easy, straightforward and very clear..
Ive always received good quality cars at low prices and in some instances I have received free upgrades!! - I, a Proud Gold Member now and receive extra discounts
